function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in infection model","Impact":"Inaccurate prediction of infections and deaths","Mitigation":"Validate model with real-world data, improve data collection methods","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate handling of serial interval distribution","Impact":"Misrepresentation of infection spread","Mitigation":"Calibrate serial interval distribution with observational data, update distribution based on new information","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, simulation models","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health research institutions, statistical agencies"},{"Description":"Country-specific reproduction number variability","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately predicting infection rates","Mitigation":"Monitor and model country-specific reproduction number trends, adjust predictions accordingly","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, statistical modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health analysts","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
